WorkItem.Description: Please open a new ticket and attach the before and after optimize files so we can see what's different
WorkItem.Summary: [Bear] After optimize lots of missing Agility

Comments.Message: Notice how it says I went from 4339AGI to 3926 yet still have a crit rating of 825. Both in the before and after build, I have the same amount of crit reforged into other stats.
Also, this is all unbuffed. If you feel that putting buffs on will significantly affect the optimization, please let me know! Thank you.

Uh... I must be missing something. What's the issue here? I don't see what the issue is. This is a before and after of optimization. Great. I can point out several things that you probably have configured wrong, since they are either definitely wrong, or just out of place for your gear level, but I don't know if that's what you're looking for. What are you asking?
Also, putting buffs on definitely will significantly affect optimization.

The description is a quote from one of the administrators. The problem is, as noted in the comments, how come I have just as much crit rating if Agility went down by over 400? Also, which buffs should I put on if I'm planning to do 10-man or 25-man raids? Also, what is configured wrong?

The words you're saying don't make sense. Crit Rating and Agility are separate stats. Why would agility being lower affect crit rating? I think you're just not communicating clearly or something.

As for things that are wrong... 
You have 2/3 Fury Swipes; I assume that's a misclick. 
You are unbuffed. That *greatly* affects calculations, as should be obvious. You should buff yourself as you expect to be buffed in whatever content you want to optimize for. Don't just say "I don't know what buffs I'll have" and check nothing. Check what you're likely to have.
There's a bug currently where the data in the bosshandler is ass-backwards by default, and you have that bad data. A quick look at it should be obvious what's out of whack, but the biggest deal is the boss offensive damage settings; use 1.5spd, 80k dmg, no parry haste, 1 target, for your gear level as a decent starting point, until Jothay fixes his fucked up boss handler data.
Ahh, I was unaware that Agility didn't affect crit rating. I got this confused with crit strike percentage which it does affect. My apologies; I'm fairly new to this game >.<
